svg.text: A beginner's guide to the codebase structure

g.text: Entry points - Each page is a route users can navigate to
Feature components used by pages - where the magic happens!
Low-level building blocks - buttons, inputs, cards, etc.
ğŸ“š Key Concepts for New Developers
Pages use components, components use UI primitives
Example: RoomPage â†’ QuestionCard â†’ Button + Input
Components can be used in multiple pages
Example: SecretCard appears in room view & admin
Data passed from parent to child components
